author: Steven Jiang, CNN
title: China to begin reporting asymptomatic coronavirus cases in its daily tally
description: Chinese health authorities will include asymptomatic cases of the novel coronavirus in their official count starting Wednesday, according to an announcement on Tuesday.
content:
(CNN)Chinese health authorities will include asymptomatic cases of the novel coronavirus in their official count starting Wednesday, according to an announcement on Tuesday.
The move during growing public concern over asymptomatic cases, of which 1,541 were … [+1691 chars]
